channel.title: Extra red water
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Extra red water" - I have this drop that i will trade for any drop i dont have.

item.title: Re: Extra red water
item.content:encoded:
I know ur looking for Kaiju Items, but anybody who has kaiju Items Ill trade any combo of:
Gold Potion-1
Super Potion-1
Reversing Hourglass-3
Rotating Timephere-1
Yoma Blood-2
Monochrome pheromone-6
CRW-3
Tell me what combo and il trade it for any kaiju drop. Dont care how bad any.

item.title: Re: Extra fruits basket and red water
item.content:encoded: I have a Helix Tattoo that I will like to trade for the Fruits Basket.

item.title: Extra fruits basket and red water
item.content:encoded:
I have a red water that i would like to trade for any drop i dont have.

Drops i already have are:
Big Mouth
Book of Spoilers
Carapace Armor
Claw Card
Fruits Basket
Go Piece
Groupies
Helix Tattoo
Kaiju Memento
Late-Night Snack
Money Printer
Polar Star
Red Water
Regalia
Shiny Belt
Soul of Steel

Message me if you are interested. My character is Yoshirou and we can bucket trade if you are interested.
